title: Draft Strategy + Fantasy Q&A, Cheese Debates - Fantasy Football Podcast for 2/10
description:
The Fantasy Footballers are back with a new episode!! Follow now for year-round fantasy football content! On today’s fantasy football podcast, lots of listener questions answered -- 2022 outlooks, dynasty questions, keeper decisions, and plenty more! Plus, should you draft for need or for best available in Dynasty Rookie Drafts? Manage your redraft, keeper, and dynasty fantasy football teams with the #1 fantasy football podcast. -- Fantasy Football Podcast for February 10th, 2022.

(02:35) - Dynasty Rookie Draft Strategy
(12:25) - NFL News
(17:15) - Mailbag
(17:30) - Justin Jefferson or Trey Lance?
(19:15) - Point Per Completion Scoring
(22:35) - Most number of leagues in a season?
(23:20) - J.K. Dobbins 2022 outlook
(25:10) - Super Bowl Coin Flip: heads or tails?
(26:10) - Cordarrelle Patterson Dynasty Value
(27:45) - Queso Debates
(31:35) - Multi-team Trades
(32:05) - DJ Moore Dynasty Value
(35:30) - Which NFL teams would you rename?
(38:50) - Trade Away Alvin Kamara?
(40:25) - Keeper Decision: Najee Harris vs Mark Andrews

Connect with the show:
Subscribe on YouTube
Visit us on the Web
Support the Show
Follow on Twitter
Follow on Instagram
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
